item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 25, 2024 at 2:45 AM UTC
item.description:
1. macOS menu bar app that shows how full the ISS urine tank is in real time (385 points | 106 comments)

7. Adversarial policies beat superhuman Go AIs (2023) (250 points | 100 comments)
8. The number pi has an evil twin (451 points | 182 comments)
9. What happened to the world's largest tube TV? [video] (617 points | 272 comments)
10. What would it take to add refinement types to Rust? (84 points | 47 comments)
11. A Practitioner's Guide to Wide Events (31 points | 21 comments)

13. Hoarder: Self-hostable bookmark-everything app (267 points | 56 comments)
14. Gordon Mah Ung has died (48 points | 5 comments)

20. i sensed anxiety and frustration at NeurIPS 24 (139 points | 96 comments)

22. Brazilian velvet ant is ultrablack (16 points | 7 comments)

24. Court of Milan orders Cloudflare to block ‘piracy shield’ domains, IP addresses (119 points | 124 comments)
25. The fair dreamed up by art legends – unsealed after 44 years (24 points | 6 comments)
26. Jujutsu Megamerges and jj Absorb (4 points | discuss)
27. More men are addicted to the 'crack cocaine' of the stock market (207 points | 445 comments)

29. My Colleague Julius (482 points | 98 comments)
30. Why making friends as an adult is harder (127 points | 166 comments)
